titles.title: A resolution amending the Standing Rules of the Senate to provide for cloture to be invoked with less than a three-fifths majority after additional debate.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S19-25, S29, S31, S32-33)
Submitted in the Senate. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Over, Under the Rule.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
Disagreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 12 - 84. Record Vote Number: 4.
Returned to the Calendar. Under Over, Under the Rule.
